Announcements

Welcome to Physics 211! This website contains everything you’ll need for our class; Blackboard will only be used to post grades.

Materials

Our textbook is the open-access book University Physics Volume 1 (W. Moebs, S. Ling, J. Sanny, et al.), published by OpenStax. This is an open-access textbook available to anyone under the terms of the CC-BY 4.0 license.You may access the textbook online or download it for free here.
